ValidationRule.description: Validates that the account Billing Zip/Postal Code is in the correct format if Billing Country is Canada
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(AND( OR(MailingCountry = "CAN", MailingCountry = "CA", MailingCountry = "Canada",OtherCountry = "CAN", OtherCountry = "CA", OtherCountry = "Canada"), NOT(REGEX(MailingPostalCode, "((?i)[ABCEGHJKLMNPRSTVXY]\\d[A-Z]?\\s?\\d[A-Z]\\d)?")),NOT(REGEX(OtherPostalCode, "((?i)[ABCEGHJKLMNPRSTVXY]\\d[A-Z]?\\s?\\d[A-Z]\\d)?"))), (RecordTypeId = "012800000003ZTZ"|| RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoB' || RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoL'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Canadian postal code must be in A9A 9A9 format
